messageBody:

> -----Original Message-----
> From: ¸¤M [mailto:fly_knife_lee@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, March 10, 2004 8:28 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Code Coverage Analysis Tool
>
> My team is developing an API, which is not an executable program
>
> I would like to ask are there any code coverage analysis tools can be
> integrated with JUnit and NetBean?
>
> I've tried Rational PureCoverage and JCover, but they both requires
> an executable test script......so how can I use these tools to
> integrate with the test scripts written for JUnit?
>
> Thanks in advance.
